title: Product Launch Email Campaign
content:
Create a comprehensive email marketing campaign for a new product launch. Include:

1. A series of 5 emails (teaser, announcement, features, testimonials, final call)
2. Subject lines optimized for open rates
3. Compelling CTAs for each email
4. Personalization strategies
5. A/B testing suggestions

Target audience: [Define your audience]
Product: [Describe your product]
Launch date: [Specify date]
Key selling points: [List main benefits]
description: Create comprehensive email marketing campaigns for product launches
author: PromptVault Team
usageNotes: Replace bracketed placeholders with your specific information. Consider your brand voice when implementing.
